_header: I am Honour whom folk of every degree
Subjects: Arthur, prince of Wales; Catherine of Aragon; pageant verses; occasional verse
_description: ‘The speche of Honour’ at the Pageant celebrating the marriage between Prince Arthur and Princess Catharine — four stanzas rhyme royal

BLCottVitAXVI.First Lines: I am honoure whome folk of euery degrepursue to haue but many of theire purpose mysse…
BLCottVitAXVI.Last Lines: …Are kept as Rewarde for noblesse & vertuethat one for youre noble Spouse & that other for you
